meanings.definition: A type of wide-brimmed hat typically worn in Mexico and other Latin American countries.
meanings.sent1: She wore a colorful sombreros to protect herself from the sun.
meanings.sent2: The market was filled with vendors selling sombreros of all sizes.
meanings.sent3: The sombreros danced in the wind, looking like happy turtles.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were like sombreros, shading us from the harsh reality.
meanings.sent5: The sombreros cast a shadow over the festive parade, adding to the vibrant atmosphere.
